name: comparability
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of two or more things, quantities, results, etc. being able to be compared : One important issue concerns the comparability of measures of achievement. The lack of exact comparability between these surveys is a problem. Almost 1 million exam results had to be recalculated to ensure comparability to past years. How do we retain strict comparability with earlier studies? Related word
